headline: Should Legal Scrutiny And New CEO Focus On Pricing Shape Procter & Gamble’s (PG) Investment Narrative?
summary: In recent days, Procter & Gamble has faced mixed developments, from legal scrutiny over Crest and Herbal Essences products to ongoing operations in complex markets like Venezuela, while continuing high-profile brand campaigns such as Bounty’s NFL-themed “Wingman” promotion. At the same time, shifting analyst coverage, investor options activity, and anticipation ahead of the January 22 earnings call under new CEO Shailesh Jejurikar are sharpening attention on how P&G balances pricing,...
